name: The Book of Buja
storyline: You are Buja, son of the dreaded Geja of Darrow. The Kingdom had experienced peace for a decade following your father's defeat until the Queen's mysterious death. Having inherited your father's ability to peer into a corpse's final moments, you are commissioned by the King to collect the remains of several Stalm pirates who were killed in the events surrounding the Queen's demise and investigate the strange man present at the time of almost every death.
summary: Explore the vast, open world of Darrow. Solve puzzles and collect the six Stalm Pirate remains. With the help of the Zapra Viti Hourglass and your ability to peer into a corpse's demise, uncover the mystery behind the Queen's untimely death.
